document.full_text: cisco systems inc  ceo john chambers, cutting back a bloated management bureaucracy he helped build, has kicked off a sweeping overhaul to revive the networking equipment maker's flagging fortunes.
document.title: cisco trims fat and sets shake-up in motion
lines_and_colors: cisco systems inc  ceo john chambers, cutting back a bloated management bureaucracy he helped build, has kicked off a sweeping overhaul to revive the networking equipment maker's flagging fortunes.
